data.1: WHEN THE SUN is folded up,
data.2: The stars turn dim and scatter,
data.4: The ten-month pregnant female camels are abandoned,
data.5: The wild beasts stampede on the run,
data.6: When the oceans surge and swell,
data.7: When souls are reunited (with the bodies)
data.8: And the little girl buried alive is asked
data.9: For what crime she was put to death;
data.10: When the ledgers are laid open,
data.11: The curtain drawn back from the skies,
data.14: (Then) every soul will know what it had prepared (for itself).
data.15: So, I call the receding stars to witness,
data.19: That this is indeed the word of an honoured Messenger,
data.20: Full of power, well-established (in position) with the Lord and Master of the Throne,
data.21: Obeyed and worthy there of trust.
data.23: He had surely seen Him on the clear horizon.
data.24: He is not chary of making public what is unknown.
data.25: This is not the utterance of an accursed devil.
data.27: This is a reminder for all the peoples of the world,
data.28: For those of you who desire to walk the path that is straight,
data.29: Though you cannot desire except as God will, the Lord of all the worlds.
